entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
